column4: I have been abstaining from upgrading my machine from 9.04 to 9.10 for months now because of trouble I heard of and had on other machines doing this, where the upgrade just stalls in the middle leaving the machine in an unusuable state. I heard that there were no problems now so I tried it last night. My machine has been on the "Getting new packages" state for 5-6 hrs now, and it says "Fetching file 2106 of 2106" and the progress bar is
you got cut off after "progress bar is"
no, it'd only be screwed if it had started installing packages, rather than merely downloading them
